name: ALERTS_PROVIDER_ACCOUNT

name: ALLOW_CORS

name: AMQP_EXCHANGE_MODE

name: AMQP_PREFETCH
description: Maximum number of unacknowledged messages per consumer

description: Name of the AMQP queue for message consumption

name: AMQP_RECONNECT_TIME_SECONDS

name: AMQP_URL
description: Connection URL for RabbitMQ message broker

name: APPLICATION_PORT
description: Port number on which the application server listens

name: AUTH_NONCE_TTL_SECONDS
description: Time-to-live for authentication nonces in seconds

name: AUTH_TOKEN

name: AUTH_VALIDITY_PERIOD_SECONDS

name: AWS_KMS_ENCRYPTION_KEY_ID

name: AWS_REGION

name: AWS_STORAGE_BUCKET_NAME

name: BLOCKAID_CLIENT_API_KEY

name: BRIDGE_API_KEY

description: Enable circuit breaker (true/false)

description: Maximum requests allowed in half-open state

description: Time window in milliseconds for tracking failures

description: Consecutive successes needed to close circuit

description: Timeout in milliseconds before attempting circuit closure

name: CONTRACT_NOT_FOUND_EXPIRE_TIME_SECONDS
